mutants.code:
def calculate_gpa(test_scores, grading_system):
    total_credits = 1
    weighted_scores = 0
    for course in test_scores:
        score = course[1]
        credits = course[2]
        grade = course[3]
        total_credits += credits
        weighted_scores += grading_system[grade] * credits
    gpa = weighted_scores / total_credits
    return gpa
